backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining course, gallery, review, contact, inquiry, and user-profile types with map-based storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report documenting removal of duplicate Contact nav link and its affected frontend file.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH color system defining red-white-black theme with light and dark variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading logo asset, Playfair Display font, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider with a Toaster.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Logo component that displays the HR Academy logo with optional ACADEMY text styling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing brand logo, quick links, contact info, and branch locations using fetched backend data.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with Home and Gallery links and a single Contact Us button for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper rendering Header, Footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/constants/brandAssets.ts: Exports the canonical logo asset path used across the application.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and utilities for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend methods, including fetching and mutating courses, images, contact info, reviews, and inquiries.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and custom color variables, including dark mode and accent utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements the admin dashboard for managing courses, gallery images, reviews, and contact information with various form handlers.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information and a form for international inquiries, submitting messages via backend mutation.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Displays courses grouped by category with dynamic badges, loading skeletons, and fetched course data.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a gallery grid using fetched images with loading states and fallbacks when no images are available.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero section, highlights, contact info, reviews, and review submission logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session storage values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for the frontend styling system.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata including architecture notes, known issues, existing features, and current state of a React + Motoko ICP dapp. Provides a comprehensive snapshot used for build planning and issue fixing.
